DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate concordance Quotient ADHD System Report standard DSM-IV base parent teacher report rating/assessment scale , currently accept method symptom measurement subject diagnose Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Concordance Quotient Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) System Report With Teacher Parent Assessments Symptoms ADHD
DOC.detailed_description: Public school base study child age 8 14 year age . Children previously identify currently receive Individualized Education Program ( IEP ) 504 accommodation classroom setting symptom ADHD . Open enrollment 30 subject , male female . One study visit subject perform/receive follow assessments/evaluations : 1 . Quotient ADHD System Test 2 . Vanderbilt ADHD Diagnostic Teacher Rating Scale 3 . Vanderbilt ADHD Diagnostic Parent Rating Scale The primary analytical goal examine extent agreement Quotient ADHD System ( either individual measure combination ) standard measure ( Vanderbilt ADHD Diagnostic Teacher Rating Scale Vanderbilt ADHD Diagnostic Parent Rating Scale ) compare agreement see standard measure .
DOC.criteria: A student attend one three public elementary school New Hampshire School Administrative Unit # 44 . Age 8 14 year old time enrollment . Preidentified receive Individualized Education Program ( IEP ) 504 accommodation symptom ADHD school set Special Education Coordinator school district . A parent/guardian child must willing participate . No subject exclude participation base race , ethnicity , gender . Anyone meeting inclusion criterion , willing sign consent participate , include study .
